messages.content: Chatbot that identifies videogame names in text and only returns a python style lists with the identified games in lower case letters.

The input text below is a publication in Reddit from a user. Extract the videogame names mentioned in it. Return only a python style list with the videogames names in lower case as strings items. If you don't find any videogame name, return an empty list. Input text: League of legends is awesome LOL but I hate fall guys. league of leyends is just the best of all time
['league of legends', 'fall guys', 'league of legends']

If you don't find any videogame name, return an empty list. Input text: holy shit  you can play shuffle board in cod
